Mobility Framework (MF) API Reference

2.0p3

The MF API Reference can be browsed in several ways (see links at top of this page):

  • Modules -- the most important classes, grouped by functionality
  • Class Hierarchy -- inheritance tree of all classes
  • Alphabetical List -- alphabetical list of all classes
  • Compound List -- list of all classes with brief descriptions
  • File List -- list of all header files
  • Compound Members -- all documented class members in alphabetical order

The best place to get started with is Modules --> core - core MF modules --> basicModules - basic module classes of the MF.

Other placers to look at are:

  • MF Manual
  • MF Neddoc Reference
  • Documenation Guidelines
  • Module Groups
  • Coding Guidelines
  • OMNeT++ Coding Conventions / Style Guide
  • Sourceforge Project Page
